cause.description:
For more information contact us at: friesianrescuesociety@yahoo.com
Or visit us at: http://friesianrescue.org/
Any horse taken under the society's stewardship, is given a permanent home among the gently rolling hills of the facility's 120 acres pasture.
The Friesian Rescue Society is a 501(c)3 non -profit organization(status pending). All positions are volunteer and an endowment is being set in place for the perpetual care of Friesian horses that are in need of sponsorship. If you wish to sponsor a Friesian or wish to provide funds to insure the success of the organization, please contact the founder at http://friesianrescue.org/
1. helping horses
cause.mission: Identify and find homes for horses that are at risk of neglect and abandonment.
